thumb.name: Simple Pleasures
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy%3Cbr%3E Thanksgiving.%3Cbr%3EMrs. Pierce%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMay you have%3Cbr%3Emany new joys%3Cbr%3Eand blessings%3Cbr%3Eto be thankful for%3Cbr%3Ein the days ahead.

thumb.name: From Our Roost
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFrom our roost%3Cbr%3Eto yours...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Thanksgiving.%3Cbr%3ESam%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Wish for Autumn
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EA Thanksgiving Wish for You. Donna May your spirit be uplifted by the cool. crisp autumn air. May your heart be warmed by moments Filled with special joys to share%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMay your soul be touched by wonder At the treasures to be found As you celebrate Thanksgiving and the beauty all around.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Lovely Thanksgiving Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor you.%3Cbr%3EAunt Sally%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you the real old-fashioned pleasures%3Cbr%3Eof a lovely Thanksgiving Day.
